resources.string: "Every pirate needs a good crew, so you'll be traveling with the very best: EURYDICE, the brave captainCASSEIOPIA 'CAS', the dashing first mate AMIRA, the clever map maker AMELIA 'MEELS', the French cook ISHA 'ISH', the peaceful surgeon ORLIC, the oddball gunner Stay safe out there, sailor. All hands hoay!

One afternoon, on a tiny island filled with the boldest, drunkest and strongest pirates in all the land, a young woman. It was unsigned, but she recognized the handwriting of her old mentor. There was no telling what shifty client he was working with this time.She turns to you. (Island)
